name: Sarah Bent
description:
I’m in search for a nice man that can love me and take good care of me, am reliable honest and loyal never cheat or hurt feelings but really looking for casual date for the first time and see where that could lead us. .
I am in the corporate profession by day. I am respectful and a good listener, love to share a glass of wine with a lovely man just to talk about everything and anything, sexy, erotic, flirt and flings. I am always well groomed too. =)
I enjoy movies,exploring new dining venues, charity work, stand up comedy, theaters, concerts… and the list could go on…. i am very passionate about life and enjoy different aspects of life. But at the same time I like to be naughty and completely let myself go in my private life. Life is too serious and life’s short. I would like to enjoy it more!!!
I am a cheerful young lady who likes to make the most out of life, always doing something different and new. I love making new friends and socializing, I am a natural born adventurer and always grab a chance to go traveling. So, why don’t you try something new too, as I can assure you I will most definitely be different!
